Reviews.Title: “Another great stay!”
Reviews.Author: missouritraveler8
Reviews.Content: Just returned from our trip to Branson and our stay at the Baldknobbers. We had a great stay here as usual! However, we did end up leaving 1 night early as we had a storm that knocked out the power at the Baldknobbers. They had no idea what the problem was or when it would be fixed! It was dark and VERY hot in our room and we knew we wouldn't be able to sleep, especially with a young child, so we just packed up (in the dark!) and left. I understand that this wasn't their fault, but they couldn't even provide us with any flashlights or candles to use so that we could just be able to see to use the bathroom! That is why I did not give them a 5 star rating. Not to mention that the manager couldn't even say she was sorry or even goodbye! I really felt, even though it was our choice to leave, that we should have been offered our money back for one nights stay.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable and Clean”
Reviews.Author: melz32
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night on the way back from Arkansas. While the motel is dated it was very clean. The staff was friendly and there is a resturant on site. They serve a great breakfast buffet. I will take clean rooms over updated decor anyday.

Reviews.Title: “Very accomodating”
Reviews.Author: lauriemc64
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to stay at the Baldknobbers Inn for our anniversary weekend, since we were planning to see the show as well. We paid $157.00 for 3 nights in a room with a King bed. We were given a $3.00 per night discount from the regular $49.99 per night for staying more than one night. Make sure that if you are one of those, like me, that has trouble climbing stairs to let them know so you wont try to be superwoman like I did and hurt for a couple of days. We decided to go home a day early, so since we checked out before 11 we were refunded one nights stay. Very nice

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, fun staff, very clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Mel R
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Baldknobber Motor Inn at least twice a year. I have never had an issue with this motel. The prices are reasonable. The staff is great, always smiling and more than willing to help. Kristi has been our housekeeper every time we've stayed and always keeps our room very clean. The girl at the front desk is always courteous and willing to help you find your way around town. The level parking really helps my wife and I get around. It's not The Hilton, but for the price I would recommend staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Not the brightest bulb in thethemp!”
Reviews.Author: Scrappy913
Reviews.Content: This is an old hotel next to the Baldknobbers show. While convenient to the show, I would not stay here again. Beds were hard and mattresses were stained. Small tv, no refrigerator, no microwave. They had real keys if you still like those.

Reviews.Title: “VERY pleased as always!”
Reviews.Author: missouritraveler8
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd stay at Baldknobbers! The first for my Son and Daughter-in-Law. We had 2 rooms side by side on the gound floor and it was great! Not sure why others complained because we will return again! Yes, it is an older motor inn, but most of them are in Branson! It is a clean, no frills place to stay with a swimming pool. The location is great, right on the strip and easy access to most everything. The people that run it are very friendly and helpful. We have never had a problem at all. Their beds are just average, but then again, I am used to a tempurpedic bed! The air conditioner worked fantastic! Which is more than I can say about some of the fancier places that I have stayed!

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time at the Baldknobbers Inn and Theater.”
Reviews.Author: mrfast120
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and neat. The staff was friendly and we didn't have any problems! You can't hardly beat the location of the motel, right on the strip and within walking distance of several nice restaurants. But best of all was the great show we saw at the Baldknobbers Jamboree show!

Reviews.Title: “clean convienient and nice staff”
Reviews.Author: scarney0180
Reviews.Content: We stayed for their $100 special where you get tickets to their show and one night in a king room. The show was really funny. The room was VERY clean, we did not find anything wrong. The housekeepers were very friendly and quick and the front desk was very helpful too. Room was comfortable, not old or small like some of the reviews said. Great stay. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “great time”
Reviews.Author: sprite4OzarkAr
Reviews.Content: we spent one night with a friend and her granddaughter. we have atayed at baldknobbers many times we, we have always been very pleased with the stay. we like the show, and the convience of the location. I.e. not haveing the fight the traffic when show is over. we would stay again. very nice

Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable, good value”
Reviews.Author: aloha-from-MO
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Baldknobbers one night. For $59.95 it was a great value. the room was very clean and comfortable. the bed was firm and comfortable. A hairdryer and ironing board were provided. you can rent a refrigerator for $5 a day. For the sink and shower, liquid soap dispensers were installed, which I thought was a better alternative than the tiny soap bars (also provided) that get slippery the first time they are used. Our room was upstairs not far from the first-floor ice dispenser, and there was a little noise from that at all hours. otherwise it was very quiet. I don't recommend the Baldknobbers restaurant; we had the breakfast buffet and while it is cheap, the food is mediocre, and all drinks are $2.50.

Reviews.Title: “ok”
Reviews.Author: sandmmoore
Reviews.Content: The beds were hard as rocks, there was no breakfast of any kind (we thought we got a free meal from the restaurant), but on the other hand my kids loved the pool (it goes to 8 feet, you don't see that at many places) and the room was clean. It was nice and quiet even being on the main strip. I'm not sure paying $66 for the room was worth it, but If you are only staying one night then go for it. I had a room reserved for the Four Seasons Inn and wish we would have stayed there.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: SFSVacherie
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Great value $46.95 Desk attendents were super nice and friendly. Room was spacious and very clean and sound-proof. We could not hear anyone on either side of us, unless they were outside. Beds were very comfortable. Room did not have a hair dryer, a fridge or ironing board. Do like us bring your own ice chest and hair dryer. I was smart this time I hung my clothes in the car, put them on the rack in the room, didn't need an iron. Clean clothes return home the same way. Great loacation, hotel next to many restaurants and theatres within walking distance. The room was modernized, but the front door could have had an inside safety latch. Bathroom door could have used a hook to hang our clothes. On my next trip there, I will bring my own hook.

Reviews.Title: “simple is great”
Reviews.Author: steelblue4evr
Reviews.Content: This was a great motel for our needs. We like to stay simple. There are no fridges or microwaves in the rooms. No irons or hairdryers either, however our room was clean. We stayed 3 nights with very peaceful sleep. The rooms are very standard two double beds we happened to be in a room connected to the restaraunt and directly under some stairs and still didn't have much noise from outside the room. It is located almost in the middle of the strip and easily accessible. Everyone has different needs so everyone may have a different experience when staying here. I enjoyed my stay since my main reason to be in Branson was to take in some of the shows and not hang out in the room this hotel was perfect for us.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Clean”
Reviews.Author: eratzlaff
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Baldknobber Motor Inn while on our vacation. The rooms were nice and clean. The motel has a great location on the strip. Everyone at the front desk was very helpful. The pool was also very nice and clean. Will stay there again whenever we come back to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: okie1gal69
Reviews.Content: There were 22 of us staying at Baldknobbers. We had five rooms and had 2 rollaways. Travis, (I think) at the front desk was very accomodating and pleasant. Housekeeping was pleasant and helpful when if came to needing extra towels or blankets. The rooms were comfortable except for the A/C units wanted to freeze up in a couple of the rooms. Also, the parking for hotel guests was very crowded especially those that had rooms in the front of the hotel. One thing we did notice is that the patrons for the theatre tend to use the motel parking lot during shows. This is very inconvenient for guests of the motor inn. Thank you very much for accomodating us!!

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
Reviews.Author: aksharp1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Baldknobbers for 3 nights over Memorial Day Weekend. The hotel is very centrally located with a few resturants within walking distance. The rooms were very clean every day and were spacious. Nothing fancy, but we were not expecting that for $47 a night. The rooms with the jacuzzi tubs are awesome. Definatly worth the extra money! The parking lot up front was a bit congested but they do have a bigger parking lot on the back side of the hotel. I didn't go to the pool but the people that I saw in there seemed to be enjoying themselves. Seemed kind of small, however. The help at the front desk could have been better. It was young guys at the front desk so I think they may have just been "filling in". They just didn't seem very helpful when asked a question. They were very nice but not helpful. I would stay here again and I would recommend it to someone who is going to Branson on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “A Little Mix Up”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We went down for the Cruisin' Branson Lights 2003, I know it is a very busy weekend therefore we made reservations in advance. When we got there she said that we didn't ask for a ground floor which we had and we wanted one on the front not the back. (We had friends staying there and wanted to be close to them). Anyway the *** *** argued with me about the room saying that we didn't ask for a bottom floor and proceeded to tell me that they had been booked for a year. Another friend of mine got a ground floor and on the front and made reservations 2 weeks before, I made mine 2 months before. Won't Return!

HotelInfo.Name: Baldknobbers Motor Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2843 West Highway 76, Box #11, Branson, MO 65616
